'''''Caltrops''''' was a simple spell.
document_data.Effects: When cast, this spell covered an area of {{SI|5|ft|long=yes}} by {{SI|5|ft|long=yes}} with [[caltrop]]s. The size of the area covered in caltrops was determined by the caster's skill level.
document_data.Components: This spell required only a [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component|somatic]] component.
